level.text: The Board may consult with and seek advice from the Office of the Attorney General (“OAG”), in coordination with the Office of General Counsel for the Chief Financial Officer, in the course of the Board’s review of each reported violation.

In making recommendations for disciplinary action, the Board may consult with and seek advice from the District of Columbia Office of Personnel and/or the applicable personnel authority for the subject agency.
